Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about your secure home network.

It is a managed privacy device that sits between your modem and your Wi-Fi router. It acts as a "filter" that cleans your household's internet traffic of ads, trackers, and malware before they reach your devices.

While a firewall blocks "doors" into your house, EncryptaGuard provides Content Intelligence. We stop devices from connecting to malicious websites and trackers that firewalls ignore.

Unlike a standard router, EncryptaGuard is a managed security service. Your $5 monthly subscription covers 24/7 remote monitoring, automated patches, and real-time global threat updates.

Standard ISP routers often send your browsing data unencrypted, allowing them to track your habits. We use DNS-over-HTTPS (DoH) to wrap your traffic in a secure tunnel.
